answers.answer: Hi,What other symptoms are present? Apart from liver disease, itching is also associated with a variety of issues such as irritation, allergic reaction, skin conditions, ,medication effect and underlying medical conditions such as diabetes or neuropathies. If the symptom persists, it is best that you have this checked by your doctor for proper evaluation.  Diagnostic tests may be indicated to determine the underlying cause. Take care and do keep us posted.

Hi,Have you talked to your doctor and found relief for the terrible itching? i had Autoimmune Hepatitis for many years and had to endure a lot of itching, all day, everyday, I was going crazy with it, it was relentless. I tried many things to try and relieve it but nothing helped until my hepatologist prescribed oral capsules called Rifampin ( it was my salvation!! ) Within a week or two it was gone and I slowly took less and less and dropped it completely. Nothing ever worked so effectively! I hope you are feeling better.Take care,Sharon
